name: example-mcp
description: Example implementations of Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers for Cursor

scripts.start:task-manager: cd mcp-servers/task-manager && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:file-explorer: cd mcp-servers/file-explorer && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:weather-service: cd mcp-servers/weather-service && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:original-example: cd mcp-servers/original-example && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:task-manager" "npm run start:file-explorer" "npm run start:weather-service"
scripts.client:task-manager: cd client-examples && npm install && npm run task-manager
